name: SFSCollectionMenu
summary: An open-source menu control for iOS utilizing UICollectionView layout.
description: SFSCollectionMenu is an open-source control for a UICollectionView-based menu. SFSCollectionMenu is designed for iOS 7, and is ARC-compliant. It works by utilizing a delegate pattern to allow you, the developer, the implement it easily and add your own code to customize its appearance and behavior.
